pages.text: When you expose a [#](bb00bb)Pastel Node[#]() to a [#](449900)redstone signal[#](), it loses its link to the connected inventory.

$(li)$(l:pastel_network/gather_node)Gather Nodes$(/l) will stop requesting items\$(li)$(l:pastel_network/provider_node)Provider Nodes$(/l) get unable to offer their items\$(li)$(l:pastel_network/sender_node)Sender Nodes$(/l) will stop emptying their inventory\$(li)$(l:pastel_network/storage_node)Storage Nodes$(/l) will get unable to accept and offer their items
